title: Chapter IX - Procedural Regulations
content:
Chapter IX - Procedural Regulations

State Regulations

Part 2390 - Powers Of Attorney (§ 2390.1 to 2390.2 to 2390.7)

Part 2391 - Service Of Process (§ 2391.1 to 2391.3)

Part 2392 - Reasonable Cause (§ 2392.1)

Part 2393 - Overpayment And Underpayment Rates Of Interest (§ 2393.1 to 2393.7)

Part 2394 - Prompt Hearing Procedure Regarding Predecision Warrants And Warrants Issued Pursuant To Jeopardy Assessments (§ 2394.1 to 2394.13)

Part 2395 - Interest Rates Determined Under Section 924-a Of The Real Property Tax Law (§ 2395.1)

Part 2396 - Electronic Filing And Funds Transfer Program For Certain Taxpayers Remitting Withholding Tax (§ 2396.1 to 2396.13)

Part 2397 - Electronic Funds Transfer Program For Certain Taxpayers Remitting Taxes Under And Pursuant To The Authority Of Articles 12-a, 13-a, 28 And 29 Of The Tax Law (§ 2397.1 to 2397.10)

Part 2398 - Consumer Bill Of Rights Regarding Tax Preparers (§ 2398.1 to 2398.3)

Part 2399 - Mailing Rules And Legal Holidays (§ 2399.1 to 2399.3)

Part 2400 - Action For Failure To Release A Lien (§ 2400.1 to 2400.3)

Part 2401 - Postponement Of Certain Deadlines For Taxpayers Affected By Declared Disasters (§ 2401.1)

Part 2402 - Taxpayer Record Retention Formats (§ 2402.1 to 2402.2)

Part 2500 - New York Reportable Transactions (§ 2500.1 to 2500.7)

Part 2505 - Repealed

Part 2600 - Tax Return Preparer Requirements (Subpart 2600-1 to 2600-6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
